chooseUser.defaultSystemData: By default, the main file data of the system personnel is retrieved, for example, the mobile phone number of the account is used for SMS, and the email is the email address of the account.
chooseUser.enterNotifyAccount: Please enter the account number you want to notify.
chooseUser.getValueFromFormComponent: Obtain a value from a form component field, for example, from an email address field, and send it to the email address.
chooseUser.supportSeparateInput: For example, if the configured template is SMS, you can enter a mobile phone number, and an email address.

configParams.selectFormFieldComponents: Select form field components to dynamically replace values in the message template
configParams.templateNotConfigured: The template is not configured with variable parameters. Please complete variable parameter configuration in the message center.

dataPush.description: Push data to third-party systems in JSON format.
dataPush.errorText: Failed to send. Please check the address and server response.
dataPush.reminderDescription: After submitting data, it will be sent to the specified webhook address in JSON format with content-type as json. The server needs to respond with a 200 status. Otherwise, the platform will consider it an exception and retry up to 3 times.
dataPush.title: Data Push
dataPush.urlPlaceholder: Enter the API address for data push

dimension.avgScore: Average (Sum of Question Scores ÷ Number of Questions)
dimension.question: Question Settings
dimension.scoreAndWithDesc: When Score/Weight Settings are enabled, all fields must be filled (or left empty), and the total weight should be 100%

downloadFile.defaultExportDescription: Default export the data filtered on the current page. It is recommended to export the filtered data. You can adjust the page size to export more data.
downloadFile.defaultNameTooltip: Default is a unique identifier + uploaded file name, such as 42d01236aec846c8a01d93541bf13a2d_unnamed.xlsx. The unique file name is to avoid overwriting the same name uploaded by different users.
downloadFile.dynamicNameDescription: Selecting fields to export files will dynamically replace field values in the file name. For example, if the file name is '${Name}-${Age}', it will be replaced with 'John-18' when exported.
downloadFile.exportAllAttachmentsTip: * Export all attachments filtered on the current page
downloadFile.title: Export
downloadFile.warning: Exporting all data may consume too many resources and impact normal system usage!

exam.autoSaveTip: Rating information will be automatically saved

exportData.exportCompleteMessage: You can perform other operations. The preparation work will be done in the background. Once ready, you can view and download it in My Messages.
exportData.selectedExportText: Selected data (data selected on current page)
exportData.title: Export Data

fileUpload.tip1: To ensure smooth data import, we recommend using:
fileUpload.tip3: Only .xls and .xlsx files are allowed, and the file size should not exceed 2MB.
fileUpload.tip4: Currently, import supports text, numbers, single-choice, multiple-choice, dropdowns, date and time, ratings, image selection, sliders, uploads, signatures, provinces and cities, locations, and mobile numbers.
fileUpload.title: Data Import
fileUpload.uploadText: Drag and drop the file here or click to upload

public.addExtensionAttributes: Add extension attribute values to the link to generate multiple links for different channels to differentiate data sources.
public.allowModifyDescription: Enable to allow modification of the searched data
public.assignedUsersDescText: Form will be published to specified users, viewable in pending forms.
public.createDataView: Create a new data view, add members to permission groups, and manage data through the view link.
public.deleteAuthGroupHandleText: This operation will permanently delete the permission group. Do you want to continue?
public.enableGenerateLink: Enable to generate form fill links that everyone can access.
public.generateFailed: Generation failed, please publish the form first
public.needInputAllConditions: Whether to input all conditions for filtering
public.publicQueryDescription: After public query, data can be queried without logging in, commonly used for score inquiries, feedback submissions, and other businesses.
public.publicReleaseDescription: After public release, all visiting users can fill in the data.

setting.accountWriteCountLimitDescription: This limits each user account to a specified number of form submissions to prevent excessive submissions.
setting.accountWriteCountLimitText: The current logged-in account has already submitted data and cannot submit again.
setting.autoNextPageDescription: Automatically move to the next page after selecting an answer, if a default value is not set. Only applicable to single-choice and dropdown questions.
setting.autoSaveUnsubmittedDataDescription: Enable this to save unsaved data. Returning users will be prompted to continue with their previous session.
setting.customFormCollection: Custom Form Collection: Time, Frequency, and Access Restrictions
setting.customFormDescription: Customize form for WeChat sharing titles and images, etc.
setting.customizePermissions: Customize which users, roles, and departments have the same permissions as the form creator and can share in managing the form.
setting.deviceWriteCountLimitDescription: This feature relies on local browser storage and may not be 100% effective.
setting.deviceWriteCountLimitText: This device has already submitted data and cannot submit again. Contact the form publisher for assistance.
setting.disableCopyQuestionTooltip: Turn on to prevent copying questions, preventing cheating
setting.elmessageEmail: The following lines should be in email format: Line
setting.elmessagePhone: The following lines should be in phone number format: Line
setting.elmessageText: The following lines do not meet the requirements:
setting.enableCommentsOnPublicQuery: Enabling this allows users to comment on data on the public query page of the form, and administrators can respond to messages.
setting.enableMaxTimeTooltip: Turn on to automatically submit when the maximum time is reached
setting.enableMinTimeTooltip: Turn on to disallow submitting within the minimum time allowed for submission
setting.enableOnePageOneQuestionDescription: Enable this to have one page for each question. Do not add page breaks within questions when this is enabled.
setting.enablePublicQueryRepliesTooltip: Enabling this will display a reply button on the public query page after data is displayed, allowing users to leave messages for administrators, who can respond.
setting.enableSwitchCountTooltip: Turn on to automatically submit after exceeding the maximum switch count
setting.enableViewAnswerTooltip: Check this box to display correct answers and explanations after submitting the questionnaire.
setting.endTips: End questions cannot be before starting questions.
setting.enterEmail: Please enter the correct email address to send the message.
setting.enterValidURL: Please enter a valid URL address
setting.examSettingDescription: Set exam-related functions, such as exam mode, answer card, etc.
setting.featureOnlyActiveWithPublicQueries: This feature only takes effect when public queries are enabled.
setting.fillWithLastSubmittedDataDescription: Enable this to save submitted data locally. Returning users will be prompted to continue with their previous submission.
setting.followOfficialAccount: To receive WeChat notifications, please follow our official account
setting.interviewTimeRestrictionDescription: Users can access the form and submit data only within the specified time range. Otherwise, a message will be displayed.
setting.ipWriteCountLimitDescription: This restricts each IP address to one submission to prevent multiple submissions from the same computer.
setting.isCancelCollaborator: Are you sure you want to cancel this collaborator?
setting.isDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete the white list entry with the ID "
setting.isExportData: Are you sure you want to export all white list data items?
setting.lastQuestionTips: The last question has been added to the extraction rules and cannot be added again.
setting.listInputPromptPopover: Please enter the list before filling out the form
setting.listValidationTips: (Participants need to input correct list information to proceed with answering)
setting.longestStayTimeDescription: The maximum time, in seconds, a user can stay on a page. Exceeding this time will automatically advance to the next page.
setting.maxSwitchCountInputLabel: Please enter the maximum screen switch count
setting.maxTimeInputLabel: Please enter the maximum time for submission
setting.minTimeInputLabel: Please enter the minimum time for submission
setting.newDataEmailNotificationDescription: Receive email notifications when new data is submitted
setting.newDataWeChatNotificationDescription: Receive WeChat notifications when new data is submitted
setting.notifySettingSubtitle: Support email or WeChat notification after submission
setting.onlyAllowLoginWriteDescription: Require users to log in to access the form non-logged-in users will be directed to the login page.
setting.passwordWriteDescription: Require a password to access the form.
setting.pelaseUpload: Please upload a display image for sharing
setting.practiceModeTooltip: Display answers immediately after each question. Supported types are multiple-choice, true/false, fill-in-the-blank questions with correct answers.
setting.questionBankRandomDrawLabel: Randomly Draw Questions from a Question Bank
setting.questionBankRandomDrawTooltip: Draw questions from a selected question bank according to rules
setting.randomDrawQuestionLabel: Randomly Draw Questions from a Pool
setting.randomDrawQuestionTooltip: Draw questions randomly from the current questionnaire pool
setting.randomQuestionOrderTooltip: Shuffle the order of questions, making the order of questions different every time.
setting.randomQuestionText: Please set the order of extraction rules in the order of questions, with the starting question before the ending question.
setting.rangeTips: Question ranges are not allowed to be repeated.
setting.recordWeChatUserInfoDescription: * Enable this to authorize login and provide WeChat nickname, gender, and city information.
setting.selectTimeRangeDesc: This form has restricted access based on time. You cannot access it at the current time. Contact the form publisher for assistance.
setting.sequentialRules: Please set the extraction rules in order of questions.
setting.setTotalWriteCountLimitDescription: When the submission limit is reached, the form will no longer accept submissions and will display a specified message.
setting.setTotalWriteCountLimitText: This form has reached the data collection limit. Contact the form publisher for assistance.
setting.settingDesc: After setting dynamic jump rules, ordinary display text or redirects will be invalidated!
setting.shortestStayTimeDescription: The minimum time, in seconds, required on each page before advancing to the next one.
setting.showAnswerCardTooltip: Turn on to display the answer card on the left side
setting.showRankTooltip: Check this box to display a leaderboard button after submitting answers.
setting.showScoreCardTooltip: Check this box to display a scorecard and explanation page after submitting answers.
setting.showScoreTextTooltip: After opening the submission, the exam score will be displayed
setting.submitSettingDescription: Custom prompt message after form submission, and can jump to a specified link.
setting.switchAuthGroupConfirm: Are you sure to switch to this permission group?
setting.textAreaPlaceholder: One name per line, each name can be up to 100 characters, copy and paste from Excel
setting.uploadImagePrompt: Please upload a sharing image * recommended size 500px*500px
setting.viewFilledContentTooltip: This feature depends on browser cache implementation. Switching devices or browsers will not allow modification. If you want to ensure that all modifications can be made, you can use the 'public query' function.
setting.whiteListDescription: Enable the whitelist feature to restrict access to authorized users.
setting.whiteListTypeDescription: Select the type of whitelist to use.
setting.wxWriteCountLimitText: This WeChat account has already submitted data and cannot submit again. Contact the form publisher for assistance.

statistics.label: Option Name
statistics.onlyChartAvailable: Only radio, checkbox, and dropdown components can generate charts

theme.confirmText: The existing theme will be replaced. Are you sure you want to switch?

viewOrUpdate.forceSaveText: If the data is not completed completely, is the mandatory submission confirmed?
viewOrUpdate.irreversibleDeletion: Irreversible deletion. Are you sure you want to delete this data?
